issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Hi,

I post my bug in the Forum, but i think it's more usefull here.

I want to make a new Module (like the doc http://developer.appcelerator.com/doc/mobile/iphone/module_sdk), and have an error message in my console with the file "build.py", when i try to build the module :

build.py", line 89

for dn in ('assets','documentation','example'):
                                              ^

IndentationError: unindent does not match any outer indentation level

Think it's a bug, in the source files generated....

Post in the Forum for more details : http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/40431/bug-create-module-...

I use Titanium 1.2.1 with SDK 1.3.2

Note that i reinstall Titanium after trying to create module, because i had a lot of bug for buiding apps.

{html}
fields.summary: bug on creation of module in SDK 1.3.2
